items.title: Can Trump fix the national debt? Republican senators, many investors and even Elon Musk are skeptical
items.description: The White House has viciously lashed out at anyone who has voiced concern about the debt snowballing under Trump, even though it did exactly that in h...

items.title: At least 31 Palestinians were killed heading to a Gaza aid site, witnesses say. Israel denies responsibility
items.description: Israel's military denied its forces fired at civilians near or within the site in the southern city of Rafah.

items.title: Ukraine and Russia quickly end their latest round of direct peace talks in Istanbul
items.description: Expectations were low for any breakthrough on ending the 3-year-old war after a string of stunning attacks over the weekend.

items.title: Trump-backed conservative Karol Nawrocki wins Poland’s presidential election
items.description: The race had Poland on edge since a first round of voting two weeks earlier, revealing deep divisions in the country along the eastern flank of NATO a...

items.title: Police investigating attack at outdoor mall in Boulder, Colorado
items.description: Several people were injured and some may have been set on fire, police said. One man was taken into custody.
